name: Hollow Throne
description: The Galaxy is at it's peak, The Hollow Throne looks horrid, It's going to need heroic deeds, To change the fate that's coming...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2GHz + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Should run even on a potato
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Should run even on a potato
